content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. May I ask what you are willing to pay per month for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month. What do you think about this price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. While I appreciate your interest, I must admit that I was hoping for a higher rental price. However, I am open to negotiation and am willing to hear your perspective. Could you please provide me with any additional information or reasons why you believe this price is fair?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that you may need some additional information. I am a student and I will be living alone in the apartment. I also plan to be very responsible and dependable in paying rent on time. Additionally, I have no other expenses besides rent, utilities, and food. I believe this price is fair because I am willing to pay what is reasonable for the size and location of the apartment. What do you think about this price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for the additional information, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant, I must admit that I am still hoping for a higher rental price. However, I am open to negotiation and am willing to hear your perspective. Could you please provide me with any additional information or reasons why you believe this price is fair?
name: Heinrich Heine
